search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for ServiceTrade (servicetrade.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for ServiceTrade can be found at: [https://www.servicetrade.com/pricing/](https://www.servicetrade.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Simple Pricing
==============

Office users are always free. Our pricing lines up with your most valuable asset – technicians.

[REQUEST PRICING](https://servicetrade.com/request-pricing/)

Select

Improve your service operations

*   Starts at 5 techs
    
*   Unlimited office users
    
*   QuickBooks integration
    
*   Live support 9 am – 7 pm ET
    
*   Certification Program
    

[REQUEST PRICING](https://servicetrade.com/request-pricing/)

Most Popular

Premium

Grow your service business

*   Best for 10-20 techs
    
*   Unlimited office users
    

Select plus

*   Service Portal
    
*   Asset maintenance tasking
    
*   Project management
    
*   Salesperson assignments
    
*   Subcontract work
    
*   Multiple Terms & Conditions
    
*   Support for contract price lists
    
*   Support for custom integrations
    

[REQUEST PRICING](https://servicetrade.com/request-pricing/)

Enterprise

Build a premium brand

*   Best for 20+ techs
    
*   Unlimited office users

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on the number of technicians, with unlimited office users included.

Simple Pricing
==============

Office users are always free. Our pricing lines up with your most valuable asset – technicians.

*   QuickBooks integration

*   Certification Program
